Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 64th/Stony Island
ShortDescription: Westbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Stony Island, Marquette, Cornell and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 64th/Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Stony Island, Marquette, Cornell and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 64th/Stony Island.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
